name: Solid Acrylic Resin PChem® BM751
description: Solid Acrylic Resin PChem® BM751 is an acrylic resin for hot melt adhesive application especially for polyurethane adhesives. BM751 provides excellent adhesion, chemical resistance, and moisture curable reactive functionalities. It is soluble in esters, ketones, aromatic, glycol ethers and glycol ether acetates. BM751 is very compatible with wide variety of other resins including acrylics, vinyl, esters, etc..
